topic.title: Log
topic.shortdesc: The Log section provides a built-in event log and diagnostics collection section.

section.title: Log
section.p: The event log enables you to identify activity and errors within the Couchbase cluster.

section.title: Collect Information
section.p: The collection information section enables you to collect logs and diagnostic information from either all nodes or selected nodes in a cluster. In addition, upload options are provided.
